description: Get All notifications sorted by most recent

response_fields.name: *processed_opportunity
response_fields.description: String::Details about what can be improved

response_fields.name: *processed_solution
response_fields.description: String::Details about how to improve it

response_fields.name: *token_values
response_fields.description: Hash::Extracted result values from the notification query
